processing_structure.text: Loop from 1 to the input value
Check if the number divides evenly
If divisible, add it to the sum

advice.text: You already have input and sum initialization; translate the remaining comments into code next.
Think of an iteration from 1 to n, and inside it use a condition to test divisibility before updating sum.
Write a for-loop with a loop variable i from 1 to n inclusive; if n % i equals 0 then add i to sum, then print the final message using n and sum.
